name: part_009
file: tmp_【#ノエル生誕はっぴーLIVE】今日は誕生日！！好きなことしてはっぴーになろおおお✨【白銀ノエル⧸ホロライブ】 [E1HXg-kjOI8]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_009.mov

scenes.description: Shirogane Noel performs the song 'Tori no Uta' on a live stage.

subtitles.original: 眩しくて逃げた
subtitles.english: Dazzled, I ran away

subtitles.original: いつだって弱くて
subtitles.english: I was always weak

subtitles.original: あの日から変わらず
subtitles.english: Unchanged from that day

subtitles.original: いつまでも変わらずに
subtitles.english: Remaining unchanged forever

subtitles.original: いられなかったこと
subtitles.english: The fact that I couldn't stay that way

subtitles.original: 悔しくて指を...
subtitles.english: Is frustrating, and I let go of...

subtitles.original: ...離す
subtitles.english: ...your fingers.

subtitles.original: あの鳥はまだうまく飛べないけど
subtitles.english: That bird still can't fly well, but

subtitles.original: いつか風を切って知る
subtitles.english: One day it will cut through the wind and know

subtitles.original: 届かない場所がまだ遠くにある
subtitles.english: The unreachable place is still far away

subtitles.original: 願いだけ秘めて見つめてる
subtitles.english: I gaze at it, keeping only my wish inside

subtitles.original: 子供たちは夏の線路 歩く
subtitles.english: The children walk along the summer tracks

subtitles.original: 吹く風に素足をさらして
subtitles.english: Exposing their bare feet to the blowing wind

subtitles.original: 遠くには幼かった日々を
subtitles.english: In the distance, those childhood days

subtitles.original: 両手には飛び立つ希望を
subtitles.english: In their hands, the hope to take flight

subtitles.original: 消える飛行機雲
subtitles.english: A fading vapor trail,

subtitles.original: 追いかけて 追いかけて
subtitles.english: chasing it, chasing it

subtitles.original: この丘を越えたあの日から変わらず
subtitles.english: Unchanged from that day we crossed this hill

subtitles.original: いつまでも真っ直ぐに僕らはあるように
subtitles.english: Wishing that we could always be straightforward

subtitles.original: 海神のような強さを守れるよ
subtitles.english: We can protect a strength like that of the sea god

subtitles.original: きっと
subtitles.english: I'm sure of it

subtitles.original: あの空を回る風車の羽たちは
subtitles.english: The wings of the windmill turning in that sky

subtitles.original: いつまでも同じ夢見る
subtitles.english: Will dream the same dream forever

subtitles.original: 届かない場所をずっと見つめてる
subtitles.english: I keep gazing at that unreachable place

subtitles.original: 願いを秘めた鳥の夢を
subtitles.english: Dreaming the dream of the bird with a hidden wish

subtitles.original: 振り返る焼けた線路
subtitles.english: Looking back at the scorched tracks

subtitles.original: 覆う入道雲
subtitles.english: and the towering clouds covering them

subtitles.original: 形を変えても僕らは覚えていて
subtitles.english: Even if their shapes change, let's remember

subtitles.original: どうか季節が残した昨日を
subtitles.english: Please, the yesterday that the season left behind

subtitles.original: 消える飛行機雲
subtitles.english: A fading vapor trail,

subtitles.original: 追いかけて 追いかけて
subtitles.english: chasing it, chasing it

subtitles.original: 早すぎる合図 僕ら笑い出してる
subtitles.english: At a signal that came too soon, we start to laugh

subtitles.original: いつまでも真っ直ぐに眼差しはあるように
subtitles.english: Wishing that our gaze could always be straightforward

subtitles.original: 汗が滲んでも手を離さないよ
subtitles.english: Even if our hands get sweaty, I won't let go

subtitles.original: ずっと
subtitles.english: Forever

subtitles.original: 消える飛行機雲 僕たちは見送った
subtitles.english: We watched the vapor trail as it disappeared

subtitles.original: 眩しくて逃げた
subtitles.english: Dazzled, I ran away

subtitles.original: いつだって弱くて
subtitles.english: I was always weak

subtitles.original: あの日から変わらず
subtitles.english: Unchanged from that day

subtitles.original: いつまでも変わらずに
subtitles.english: Remaining unchanged forever

subtitles.original: いられなかったこと
subtitles.english: The fact that I couldn't stay that way

subtitles.original: 悔しくて指を...
subtitles.english: Is frustrating, and I let go of...

subtitles.original: ...離す
subtitles.english: ...your fingers.
